mapper.select: select o.orderseq, o.orderdate, b.name as Lunchname, b.pic as Lunchpic, b.category as LunchCategory, p.periodshipseq, p.shipdate, p.shiptime, p.shipperiod, p.dayperweek from tblOrder o inner join tblOrderCart t on o.orderseq = t.orderseq inner join tblCart c on t.cartseq = c.cartseq inner join tblPeriodShip p on c.periodshipseq = p.periodshipseq inner join tblSellBoard s on c.sellboardseq = s.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchboxSet l on s.sellboardseq = l.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchBox b on l.lunchboxseq = b.lunchboxseq where o.id = #{id}

select o.orderseq, o.orderdate, o.couponseq, b.name as Lunchname, b.pic as Lunchpic, b.category as LunchCategory, b.price, p.periodshipseq, p.shipdate, p.shiptime, p.shipperiod, p.dayperweek, c.sale from tblOrder o inner join tblOrderCart t on o.orderseq = t.orderseq inner join tblCart c on t.cartseq = c.cartseq inner join tblPeriodShip p on c.periodshipseq = p.periodshipseq inner join tblSellBoard s on c.sellboardseq = s.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchboxSet l on s.sellboardseq = l.sellboardseq inner join tblLunchBox b on l.lunchboxseq = b.lunchboxseq inner join tblCoupon c on o.couponseq = c.couponseq where o.id = #{id}
